title: Name 5 extremely frustrating champions in Lane
body:
{{champion:7}} because her early game burst is frustrating and annoying yet I find her easier to stop the longer the game lasts

{{champion:268}} Fuck his poke

{{champion:157}} HASAGI HASENYO BULLSHIT DASHES WOOOOOOOOO

{{champion:99}} Her E's annoying and her Ult cooldown is so low

{{champion:143}} Plants can fuck my ass

replies.body:
{{champion:25}}- Her snare is very annoying if your trying to chase/run away from her, also fairly annoying if you get hit in lane
{{champion:99}}- Her combo can demolish squishy targets 
{{champion:9}}- Annoying in teamfights with ult and {{item:3157}}
{{champion:56}}- When he ults, you panic due to if you don't know where he is going to show up
{{champion:30}}- Ult makes it so you nearly never get away with a sliver of health.

{{champion:1}}  100-0 burst at 6 with a doran ring lol
{{champion:91}}  100-0 burst at 6 with a long sword
{{champion:238}}  100-0 burst at 6 with no chance of returning damage an under your tower
{{champion:133}}  that fucking blind
{{champion:157}}  windwall dashing all over the place can make him go 0-20 but he buys shiv and can 1 vs 1 anyone on your team.

{{champion:103}}  yay 3 flashes
{{champion:105}}  i know exactly where to stick that pole
{{champion:36}}  take those cleavers and put them somewhere else
{{champion:57}}  stop humping me
{{champion:429}}  sit

sona
mundo
mf
olaf
karma

edit: replace any of these with illaoi

{{champion:7}} GET THE FUCK OVER HERE
{{champion:80}} I KNOW YOU FALL OFF BUT PLZ
{{champion:114}} WHY DOES THAT NOT COST MANA
{{champion:122}} plz have mercy on my butthole
{{champion:420}} HENTI

{{champion:54}} - watch me work my ass off to dodge his e and try to combo correctly as riven when all he has to do is press w and aa me while standing still to outtrade me.

{{champion:39}} - walks into my lane with e and stuns me for 1.5 sec because i started dorans blade to survive her cancerous damage

{{champion:58}} - could be one of the worst players in the game but the champ is so easy to play he can pretty much faceroll and become a god while having no mechanics or game knowledge.

{{champion:57}} - have to workj my ass off to survive in lane while he spams q for 20 mana and has insane sustain . he has a point and click snare and hsi ulti makes him nearly unkilable and a great teamfighter and laner.

{{champion:80}} - work my ass off to not walk near him, but hes going to get me low regardless because of his q spam and his 0 skillshot bullshit that allows him to even crit me when im low. he is so damn braindead and gets rewarded for being really easy to play
